module.name: individual_product_structure
module.keywords: module, individual, product, relationship, structure, process plant

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record:

ul.li: the decomposition of an individual product into component individual products;
the individual products that are used to make a connection;
the relationship between an individual product and its container.

li.p: the existence of an individual product;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Product_as_individual application module.

li.p: a whole-part relationship between two individual products;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Composition_of_individual_product application module.

li.p: a connection relationship between two individual products;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Connection_of_individual_product application module.

li.p: a containment relationship between two individual products;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Containment_of_individual_product application module.

li.p: the involvement of an individual product in a connection between individual products.
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Involvement_of_individual_product_in_connection application module.
Class of product is within the scope of the Class_of_product_structure application module.

li.p: membership of a class of product.
li.note: Membership of a class of product is within the scope of the Product_structure_and_classification application module.

uof.name: individual_product_structure
uof.description: The individual_product_structure UOF provides the ability to record information about individual products and their structure.
